dc_title_s: Map of the Indian Empire including Ceylon and the Straits Settlements.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:5,000,000 ; conic proj. Accompanied by index. Inset: India showing military stations and railways, languages, religions -- town plans of Bombay, Calcutta, Madras, etc. Relief shown as hachures and heights in feet. Shows: international and administrative boundaries, railways, canals.|Scale 1:5,000,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
